name: Kanban
tagline: Kanban built with HTML5 drag & drop
description: This project is a Trello style kanban board using only the HTML5 drag and drop spec.

name: Newsallo
tagline: All your news in one feed
description: Newsallo is a platform that brings all of your favorite news sources into one beautiful and easy to read feed.

name: Aegis Custody
description: Corprate website for digital asset custody company Aegis Custody.

name: Baseframe
tagline: Minimize development time & reduce CSS clutter
description: Baseframe is an open source CSS library of the most commonly used CSS properties turned into easy to use pre-existing classes to help minimize development time and reduce CSS clutter.

name: Order Maestro
description: A restaurant order management app designed specifically for use on tablets.

name: Startup News
description: Startup News Scraper pulls in(by scraping) all of the newest and hottest startup news from Tech Crunch.
